info.title: ZERO API
info.description: Personal AI Assistant - Sprint management, task tracking, knowledge management, and agent orchestration

schema.title: Response List Sprints Api Sprints Get

post.description: Create a new sprint.

schema.title: Response Get Current Sprint Api Sprints Current Get

post.description: Start a sprint (set to active).
Complete a sprint.

get.description: Get Kanban board data for a sprint.

schema.title: Response List Tasks Api Tasks Get

post.description: Create a new task.

get.description: Get all backlog tasks (not assigned to any sprint).

schema.title: Response Get Backlog Api Tasks Backlog Get

post.description: Move task to a new status.

schema.title: Response List Projects Api Projects Get

post.description: Register a new project.
Scan a project for enhancement signals (TODO, FIXME, etc.).

get.description: Get project context for Claude (CLAUDE.md, README, structure, git info).

schema.title: Response Get Project Context Api Projects  Project Id  Context Get

get.description: Get all tasks associated with a project.

schema.title: Response Get Project Tasks Api Projects  Project Id  Tasks Get

post.description:
Connect a project to a GitHub repository.

Parses the GitHub URL, fetches repo metadata, and updates project settings.

schema.title: Response Connect Github Api Projects  Project Id  Github Connect Post

post.description:
Sync GitHub issues and PRs with the project.

Fetches latest issues and PRs from GitHub and updates project metadata.

schema.title: Response Sync Github Api Projects  Project Id  Github Sync Post

get.description: Get GitHub sync status and statistics for a project.

schema.title: Response Github Status Api Projects  Project Id  Github Status Get

post.description: Disconnect GitHub from a project.

schema.title: Response Disconnect Github Api Projects  Project Id  Github Disconnect Post

post.description:
Convert GitHub issues to sprint tasks.

Creates tasks from open GitHub issues that don't already have corresponding tasks.

schema.title: Response Sync Github Issues To Tasks Api Projects  Project Id  Github Sync To Tasks Post

post.description: Start the orchestrator and all agents.
Stop the orchestrator and all agents.
Trigger a specific orchestrator action.

Trigger full enhancement cycle: scan + create tasks.
This is the main endpoint for automated enhancement detection.
Trigger sprint intelligence analysis: health check + proposal generation.
Trigger automatic sprint updates (recalculate points, sync state).

get.description: Get health assessment for a specific sprint.

post.description: Generate AI-powered sprint proposal.

Invoke the LangGraph orchestration graph with a user message.

Routes the message through the supervisor to specialized subgraphs
(sprint, email, calendar, enhancement, briefing).

get.description: Get the status of the LangGraph orchestration graph.

schema.title: Response Get Signals Api Enhancements Signals Get

post.description: Convert an enhancement signal to a sprint task.
Dismiss an enhancement signal.
Trigger a scan for new enhancement signals.

get.description: Get all notes with optional filters.

schema.title: Response List Notes Api Knowledge Notes Get

post.description: Create a new note.

schema.title: Response Search Notes Api Knowledge Notes Search  Query  Get

post.description: Learn a new fact about the user.
Add a contact to the user's network.

Recall relevant memories based on context.

This endpoint searches through notes, facts, and optionally tasks
to find information relevant to the given context.

get.description: Recall relevant memories based on context (GET version).

schema.title: Response Get Knowledge Stats Api Knowledge Stats Get

get.description: Get available Whisper models with their specifications.

post.description:
Transcribe an uploaded audio file to text.

Supports: mp3, wav, m4a, ogg, webm, flac, mp4, mpeg, mpga

Models (ordered by speed/accuracy tradeoff):
- tiny: Fastest, lowest accuracy
- base: Fast with decent accuracy (recommended)
- small: Balanced speed and accuracy
- medium: Good accuracy, slower
- large: Best accuracy, slowest

Transcribe audio and automatically create a note from the transcription.

This combines transcription with note creation in the Second Brain system.
Perfect for voice memos and audio notes.

schema.title: Response List Jobs Api Audio Jobs Get

get.description: Get a transcription job by ID.

post.description:
Transcribe an audio file from a server path.

Useful for processing files already on the server (e.g., from voice messages).

get.description:
Get Gmail OAuth authorization URL.

User should visit this URL to authorize ZERO to access their Gmail.

parameters.name: redirect_uri

schema.description: OAuth redirect URI (defaults to API callback)
schema.title: Redirect Uri

parameters.description: OAuth redirect URI (defaults to API callback)

get.description:
Handle OAuth callback from Google.

This endpoint receives the authorization code and exchanges it for tokens.

post.description:
Set Gmail OAuth client configuration.

Upload the credentials.json downloaded from Google Cloud Console.
This should be done once during initial setup.
Disconnect Gmail account.

Sync inbox from Gmail.

Fetches recent emails and caches them locally.

schema.title: Response List Emails Api Email Messages Get

post.description: Mark email as read.
Archive email (remove from inbox).
Star or unstar an email.
Convert email to a task.

schema.title: Response Get Labels Api Email Labels Get

get.description: Get Google Calendar OAuth authorization URL.

post.description: Set Google Calendar OAuth client configuration.
Disconnect Google Calendar account.
Sync calendar events from Google Calendar.

schema.title: Response List Calendars Api Calendar Calendars Get

get.description: List calendar events with optional date range filter.

schema.title: Response List Events Api Calendar Events Get

post.description: Create a new calendar event.
Create a calendar event from a task.

get.description:
Get the daily briefing.

Includes calendar events, tasks, emails, and reminders for today.
Set refresh=true to regenerate the briefing.
List reminders with optional status filter.

schema.title: Response List Reminders Api Assistant Reminders Get

post.description: Create a new reminder.

get.description: Get reminders due within the specified hours.

schema.title: Response Get Upcoming Reminders Api Assistant Reminders Upcoming Get

post.description: Snooze a reminder for the specified minutes.
Dismiss a reminder.
Mark a reminder as completed.

schema.title: Response List Notifications Api Assistant Notifications Get

post.description: Mark a notification as read.
Mark all notifications as read.

get.description: List ideas with optional filters, sorted by viability score.

schema.title: Response List Ideas Api Money Maker Get

post.description: Create a new idea manually.

get.description: Get top ideas by viability score.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Number of top ideas to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Number of top ideas to return

schema.title: Response Get Top Ideas Api Money Maker Top Get

get.description: Get a specific idea by ID.

post.description: Generate new ideas using LLM.

schema.title: Response Generate Ideas Api Money Maker Generate Post

post.description: Research an idea using web search and LLM analysis.

Mark idea as pursuing and optionally create sprint tasks.

If sprint_id is provided in the action body, tasks will be created
from the idea's first_steps.
Park an idea for later consideration.
Reject an idea with optional reason.

Manually trigger the full daily cycle:
1. Generate new ideas
2. Research top unresearched ideas
3. Rank all ideas
4. Send notifications for high-potential ideas

get.description: Get details of a specific workflow.

post.description: Trigger a workflow execution.

get.description: Get status of a specific execution.

post.description: Resume a crashed/interrupted execution.

get.description: List all circuit breakers and their current status.

schema.title: Response List Circuit Breakers Api System Circuit Breakers Get

post.description: Manually reset a circuit breaker to CLOSED state.

schema.title: Response Reset Circuit Breaker Api System Circuit Breakers  Name  Reset Post

get.description: Get scheduler status with next run times.

schema.title: Response Scheduler Status Api System Scheduler Status Get

get.description: Get recent scheduler job execution history.

schema.title: Response Scheduler Audit Api System Scheduler Audit Get

post.description: Manually trigger a scheduled job.

schema.title: Response Trigger Job Api System Scheduler Jobs  Job Name  Trigger Post

get.description: List all available backups by tier.

schema.title: Response List Backups Api System Backups Get

post.description: Trigger a manual backup.

schema.title: Response Trigger Backup Api System Backups Post
Response List Topics Api Research Topics Get

post.description: Create a new research topic.
Seed default research topics.

get.description: List research findings with optional filters.

schema.title: Response List Findings Api Research Findings Get

get.description: Get top findings by composite score.

schema.title: Response Get Top Findings Api Research Findings Top Get

post.description: Mark a finding as reviewed.
Dismiss a finding as not relevant.
Create a Legion task from a research finding.
Manually trigger the daily research cycle.
Manually trigger the weekly deep dive research.

schema.title: Response Get Recent Cycles Api Research Cycles Get
Response Search Knowledge Api Research Knowledge Search Get

post.description: Submit feedback on a finding for self-improvement.
Trigger self-improvement recalibration based on accumulated feedback.

get.description:
Readiness probe  checks critical dependencies.
Used by Docker health checks to determine if container is healthy.
Returns 503 if any critical dependency is down.
